TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActivityContext extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The base class for context classes that represent the execution environment of an activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class provides limited access to the Windows Workflow Foundation (WF) runtime and is the base class for all execution contexts that are provided by Windows Workflow Foundation (WF).

Docs.value: The unique identifier of the currently executing activity instance.
